## Exploratory Data Visualization

Check out data a bit

```{r}
#| include: false
#tell me the column names

names(penguins)

#what are the dimensions
dim(penguins)

#Show the first 6 lines
head(penguins)

#Show the last 6 lines
tail(penguins)
```
